text: Park Min-jae (Korean: 박민재; 25 June 1992 – 29 November 2024) was a South Korean Korean drama actor. He was best known for his roles in dramas Little Women (2022) and True to Love (2023). He is also known for his roles in the 2023 drama , about the Goryeo–Khitan War based on the 2018 novel by Gil Seung-soo. He also played in among others (2023), and Netflix's (2022). While not having health issues, Min-jae died while on voyage in China on 29 November 2024, at the age of 32, from a cardiac arrest. His death received worldwide media attention. ==References== Category:South Korean actors Category:1992 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Park Min-jae
